exceptions.exn: In environment sigma_sum_split : forall (i n : nat) (f : nat -> nat), i < n -> ∑ (S n) f = f i + f n + ∑ i f + ∑ (n - S i) (fun j : nat => f (S i + j)) sum_permutation_1 : forall (n i j : nat) (g f : nat -> nat), i < j < n -> g i = j -> g j = i -> (forall k : nat, k <> i -> k <> j -> k < n -> g k = k) -> ∑ n f = ∑ n (fun i0 : nat => f (g i0)) flat := fun (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (i : nat) => if le_lt_dec n i then n else f i : nat -> (nat -> nat) -> nat -> nat flat_left : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> nat) (i : nat), i < n -> flat n f i = f i n : nat f : nat -> nat i : nat H : n <= i Unable to unify "flat ?M1460 ?M1461 ?M1462 = ?M1461 ?M1462" with "flat n f i = n".
